item.title: [CONFIGURATION-230] XPathExpressionEngine nodeKey method create a wrong key for attribute node
item.description:
In org.apache.commons.configuration.tree.xpath.XPathExpressionEngine line 178

if (node.isAttribute())

{ buf.append(ATTR_DELIMITER); }

should be changed to

if (node.isAttribute())

{ buf.append(NODE_PATH_DELIMITERS); }

Using ATTR_DELIMITER will create key like element@attribute rather than element/@attribute and make config reload fail.
item.summary: XPathExpressionEngine nodeKey method create a wrong key for attribute node

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
